participant_abstract.sent: It gave us very preliminary insight of our roles in the project.
The task is to design a new remote control for TV set.
There are four responsible participants in the project, which were speaking.
Project manager made a brief introduction and all participants presented their first ideas related to the project requirements.

participant_actions.sent: I don't have specific idea of others, but I guess all participants should prepare a presentation of their point of view.

participant_decisions.sent: Use only a small number of buttons for the device.
Use radio waves instead of IR for communication with TV. backlight the buttons of the device

participant_problems.sent: Earphones/microphones attached to us have short wires, not long enough to go to board!
